metadata.synopsis: Tieflings will wait for the gnomes to rescue them if the gnome have tools and their back wall is broken down whilst the tieflings are still in their cells.Their out of combat behaviour has them huddle close to their own wall, hoping for rescue.If combat starts, they give in and start smacking the wall as well.

0.speaker: Lakrissa
0.text: Shh. Not a word - the gnomes are on their way.
0.context: NodeContext: Quiet, hushed, determined (about to escape the prison)

1.speaker: Lia
1.context: NodeContext: panicked, hammering on a a stone ball (back of her prison cell) calling out for help

2.speaker: Lia
2.text: The gnomes have scarpered - get ready to move.
2.context: NodeContext: Quiet, hushed, determined (about to escape the prison)

3.speaker: Lakrissa
3.context: NodeContext: panicked, hammering on a a stone ball (back of her prison cell) calling out for help
